name: Yin and Yang: Duality Duel
description:
Made for the 2022 Global Game Jam (Theme: Duality)

Swap between two different souls to battle waves of enemies in this non stop action game!

Yin is able to charge powerful kicks while Yang can rapidly fire punches, switching between the two is your key to victory!

CONTOLS:

A - Left

D - Right

W - Jump

J - Yin's attacks, hold to charge and release to kick

K - Yang's attacks, keep pressing to rapidly throw out punches
